projects.name: Custom Home – Richmond Hill
projects.summary: Full electrical for a custom 2-storey build: 200A service upgrade, layered lighting plan, EV charger, and rough-in for future solar.

projects.name: Retail Build-out – Markham
projects.summary: Tenant fit-out: new circuits for POS and HVAC, 3 lighting zones with dimming, and emergency lighting to code.
